brand.name: Sam Edelman
brand.ethicalInfo1: Sam Edelmandoes not communicate sufficient information about its environmental policies
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Sam Edelman is owned by Caleres Inc.

Its environment rating is 'very poor'. It does not publish sufficient relevant information about its environmental policies to give a higher rating. As a shopper you have the right to know how its products impact on the environment.

Its labor rating is 'not good enough'. It covers most workers' rights principles in its code of conduct. It uses unannounced audits with new suppliers but it only conducts follow up audits if faults occur. It sources from countries with high or extreme risk of labor abuse. It pays a wage in accordance with local laws but not the definition of a living wage. It traces its suppliers in the final stage of production but does not publicly share a list of its suppliers.

Its animal rating is 'not good enough'. It uses leather, wool, down, crocodile skin, shearling and mohair without stating its sources. It does not use fur or angora.

Sam Edelman is rated 'Not Good Enough' based on information from our own research.

Last Updated: March 2017
brand.positiveText: Dear Sam Edelman, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Sam Edelman, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
